overview: Set in the midwest town of Rankin, "Boo!" revolves around the mysterious drowning of Emma Manning (Molly Kaufman), A death that still haunts the small community and is grist for adolescent games that turn into terror.  Rankin's twenty-something  townies taunt the rich kids at the local college with tales of death. Kera (Lauren Carter) is a curious local drawn to the mystery...no matter where it takes her.
title: Boo! The Movie
